name: Employment Law Playbook
description: Comprehensive playbook for employment-related legal disputes including unfair dismissal, discrimination, harassment, and victimisation claims under UK employment law

rules.description: If dismissal occurred within 90 days of protected activity, investigate potential victimisation under Employment Rights Act 1996 and Equality Act 2010
If employee is over 40 and replaced by significantly younger person, assess age discrimination

assess_dismissal_type.question: What type of employment issue occurred?

low.description: Limited damages for weak cases or minor violations

medium.description: Moderate damages for cases with reasonable prospects

high.description: Substantial damages for strong cases with clear violations
